roleset.name: burn incompletely
roleset.note: CHAR-V NOTES: Frames file for 'char' based on sentences in wsj. Verbnet entry 45.4. (from char.01-v predicate notes)

example.name: adjectival
example.text: Emergency crews searched through the charred rubble of a Phillips Petroleum Co. plastics plant near Pasadena, Texas, where a series of explosions Monday killed at least two people and injured 124.

example.name: with agent
example.text: Somehow or another, John even managed to char his orange juice.
